cleaned_text: Crystal & Herb Wish Bottle Manifest and reach for the skies with our Caretuals Crystal & Herb wish bottle. The wish bottle contains 7 chakra crystal chips and herb confetti and is meant to be used to manifest what you desire. Simply hold the wish bottle, close your eyes and say out loud what you want to manifest and imagine it happening. You may also write it down on a piece of paper and place the crystal and herb bottle over it. Cleanse with palo Santo, incense or sage and repeat to change your manifestation. ingredients: Crystal chips - red agate, tigers eye, citrine, peridot, dumortierite, amethyst, clear quartz Herbs -
